validators.customValidation: Here will be custom message for your custom validation.

login.title: Hello! Enter your user
login.forgotTitle: We need your email address so you can access your account, then we will send you a recovery email.

register.title: Register! Create your new account here

httpErrors.400: The server cannot process the request due to a client error.
httpErrors.404: The request could not be found.
httpErrors.405: A request was made with a resource not supported by that resource (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).
httpErrors.501: The server either does not recognize the request method or lacks the ability to complete it.
httpErrors.502: The server is acting as a gateway or proxy and has received an invalid response from the other server.
httpErrors.504: The request timeout has been exceeded.
